Post.title: OSI/TCP/IP
Post._content:
## .OSIOpen System Interconnection

|           OSI           |                                        |               TCP/IP               |
| :---------------------: | :--------------------------------------: | :----------------------------------: |
| (Application Layer)  |  | HTTPHTTPSFTPTELNETSSHSMTPPOP3 |
| (Presentation Layer) |  |                                  |
|   (Session Layer)    |  |                                  |
|  (Transport Layer)   |  |               TCPUDP                |
|   (Network Layer)    | () |      IPICMPRIPOSPFBGPIGMP      |
| (Data Link Layer)  |  |     SLIPCSLIPPPPARPRARPMTU     |
|   (Physical Layer)   |  |               ISO2110               |

##  .TCP/IP

|     OSI     | TCP/IP |                           |
| :---------: | :----: | :-------------------------: |
| // |     | HTTPFTPTFTPSMIPSNMPDNS |
|          |     |           TCPUDP           |
|          |     |    ICMPIGMPIPARPRARP    |
|  /  |   |                    |

## .TCP/IP

![u=2021599465,3053942252&fm=27&gp=0](osiTcpIp/tcp.jpg)

- 

  TCP/IPARPRARPIP

- 

  OSI

  IPTCP/UDPTCPUDPIP

- 

  TCP/IPTCPUDP

  TCP

  ![tcpport](osiTcpIp/tcpport.png)

  TCP20205432

  - 162^160~65536

  - 323232

  - 1645TCP205x32bit8bit5x4=2060.

    6

    - URG (urgent)    
    - ACK (acknowledgement)  10
    - PSH (push)  1
    - RST (reset)  1
    - SYN (synchronous)  1SYN=1ACK=0SYN=1ACK=1
    - FIN (FINis)  FIN1 

    16

    -   
        

  - 1616

    - 16  
    - 16  URG1URG0URG

  -   TCP6040[TCP](http://book.51cto.com/art/201306/400263.htm)

- 

  httpftp()snmp()telnet()smtp()dns()osi 

### TCP

- TCP
- 
- TCPIP

![TCP](osiTcpIp/sequencenumber.jpg)

- 32seq=xSYN132swq=yack=x+1SYNACK1ack=y+1
- seq=x+2ack=y+1FIN1ack=x+3ACK1seq=y+1FIN1ack=x+3seq=y+1 FIN1ack=y+2

### 

- Window

  ![TCP](osiTcpIp/seqpre.png)

  - seqACK0SYN1seqack+1SYNACK1ack+1ACK1
  - +1ACKFIN1+1ACKFIN1+1ACK1

Post.title: Javascript Event Loop
Post._content:
#### javascriptEvent Loop

## 
### javascriptDOMDOMjavascript
## H5web workerDOM

## 
### 
![](eventloop/eventloop.png)
###  stackmicrotask queuenextTickPromisetask queueDOMAJAXsetTimeoutsetImmediatemicrotask queue

## Event Loop
### Event Loop

## nextTicksetImmediatesetTimeout
### nextTickEvent LoopqueuenextTicknextTick
``` bash
process.nextTick(function () {
    console.log('nextTick1');
    process.nextTick(function (){console.log('nextTick2')});
});
  
setTimeout(function timeout() {
    console.log('setTimeout');
}, 0)
```
### nextTick1nextTick2setTimeoutnextTicksetTimeout

### setImmediateEvent LoopEvent Loop
### setTimeoutsetImmediate
``` bash
setImmediate(function () {
    console.log('setImmediate1');
    setImmediate(function (){console.log('setImmediate2')});
});
  
setTimeout(function timeout() {
    console.log('setTimeout');
}, 0);
```
### setImmediate1setTimeoutsetImmediate2setTimeoutsetImmediate1setImmediate2setTimeoutsetImmediate1Event LoopsetImmediate2setImmediate1Event Loop

## Node.jsEvent Loop
### Node.jsEvent Loop
### 1.Chrom V8Javascript
### 2.Node API
### 3.LIBUVNode APIEvent Loop
### 4.Chrom V8
![](eventloop/nodesystem.png)

## Node.js Event Loop
### node.jsI/OI/OLIBUVnodeI/ONodeEvent LoopI/ONodenode

## Node Event Loop
``` bash
   

>        timers         

  

  

       I/O callbacks     

  

  

       idle, prepare     

        

           incoming:   

           poll          <  connections, 

           data, etc.  

        

          check          

  

  

    close callbacks    

   
```
### 
- timers: setTimeout()setInterval()
- I/O callbacks: timerssetImmediateTCPerror
- idle, prepare: nodejsI/Oprepare
- poll: fdsocket
- check: setImmediate()
- close callbacks: socket.on('close', ...)

### 1.setTimeout
![](eventloop/eventloop-setTimeout0-unfile.png)

Post.title: Mongodb Mac
Post._content:
######Mongodb MacHomebrew,Homebrew mongodbdata/dbdatamongod

## Homebrew
### 
``` bash
ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"
```


### Homebrew
##### 1.brew
``` bash
brew update
```
##### 2.
``` bash
brew install 
```
##### 3.
``` bash
brew uninstall 
```
##### 4.brew
``` bash
brew list
```
##### 5.
``` bash
brew upgrade brew
```  
##### 6.
``` bash
brew outdated
```
##### 7.
``` bash
brew search
```
##### 8.brew
``` bash
brew --cache
```

## mongodb
### 
``` bash
brew install mongodb
```
### 
##### 1.
``` bash
cd /
```
##### 2. -p,sudo
``` bash
mkdir -p data/db
```
### 
##### 1.
``` bash
cd /
```
##### 2. -R
``` bash
sudo chown -R  data/db
```
### mongodb
##### 1.mongodb server
``` bash
mongod
```
##### 2.,
``` bash
mongo
```

Post.title: mongodb Linux
Post._content:
###### Linuxmongodbmongohub

## ,Ubuntu16.04
https://www.mongodb.com/download-center#community
## ,maclinux scp DownloadsmongodbIp:/
``` bash
scp Downloads/mongodb-linux-x86_64-ubuntu1604-3.6.1.tgz @4IP:/
```
### tgz tar
``` bash
tar -zxvf mongodb-linux-x86_64-ubuntu1604-3.6.1.tg
```
### mongodb
``` bash
mkdir mongodb
```
### mongodb
``` bash
mv mongodb
```
### mongodbdatadb logoslog,logsmongodb.log
``` bash
mkdir data
mkdir logs
cd logs/
touch mongodb.lo
```
### mongodbetc
``` bash
mkdir etc
```
### etcmongo.conf
``` bash
dbpath=/mongodb/data/
logpath=/mongodb/logs/mongodb.log
logappend=true // 
quiet=true //truefalse
port=27017 //
```
### mongodb->mongo->bin mongomongod
``` bash
mongod -f /mongodb/etc/mongo.conf
```
### 27017
### macmongohubDatabasemongodb
![](mongo-install-linux/mongohub.png)
